ValidationRule.description: This validation rule is for remorse refunds that are created more than 30 days from the revenue opportunity closing
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Remorse Refund"), NOT( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption ), OR( PRIORVALUE(StageName)= 'Return Created', ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Return Initiated')),
ISBLANK(Exemption_Request_Justification__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to fill out 'Exemption Request Justification' before you can save the refund
